_header: Queen of heaven mother and may
_description: ‘Fonde euermore to Say the Beste’ — seven 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) with refrain, ‘to sey þe beste’

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Qween of heuene Moder and MaySaue hem alle nou þat
                    ben here…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Nou to þis word ȝe take good hedeffor Marie loue to
                    seye þe beste
